text: Hagi nagrama haviza hunesuge'za frigahane hu'za zamagra hanazana, fri'zankura korera ofregahue. Hu'neanagi zamagrama mago kema hunantesaza kemo'ma tamage agafa'ama omanenesiana, mago ne'mo'a amuha osu'neankino zamagri zamazampina navare ontegahie. Nagra ama keaga Sisante retufentoankino agra refako hugahie.
